En esta secci√≥n se publicar√° el calendario de pr√°cticas actualizado. Adem√°s: 

- Recordad que la **asistencia a las pr√°cticas es obligatoria**. 
- Aquellas pr√°cticas con una fecha an√≥mala se han marcado con una advertencia ‚ö†Ô∏è.

<div id="calendar-grid"></div>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const practicas = [
    { id: 1, title: "Introducci√≥n a Processing", icon: "bi-laptop",
      summary: "Primer contacto con Processing: entorno, dibujo b√°sico y animaci√≥n.",
      dates: ["2026-02-11", "2026-02-12"] },

    { id: 2, title: "Entorno de programaci√≥n para Java", icon: "bi-code-slash",
      summary: "Instalaci√≥n y primeros pasos en un entorno de desarrollo para Java.",
      dates: ["2026-02-18", "2026-02-19"] },

    { id: 3, title: "Resoluci√≥n de problemas en Java (I)", icon: "bi-code-slash",
      summary: "Ecuaciones de segundo grado.",
      dates: ["2026-03-03", "2026-03-04"] },

    { id: 4, title: "Aspectos avanzados de Excel", icon: "bi-table",
      summary: "F√≥rmulas, funciones, tablas y an√°lisis b√°sico de datos.",
      dates: ["2026-03-11", "2026-03-12"] },

    { id: 5, title: "Resoluci√≥n de problemas en Java (II)", icon: "bi-code-slash",
      summary: "Implementaci√≥n de algoritmos cl√°sicos.",
      dates: ["2026-03-18", "2026-03-19"] },

    { id: 6, title: "Resoluci√≥n de problemas en Java (III)", icon: "bi-code-slash",
      summary: "Ordenaci√≥n de n√∫meros.",
      dates: ["2026-04-08", "2026-04-09"] },

    { id: 7, title: "Visualizador de elementos gr√°ficos", icon: "bi-display",
      summary: "Identificaci√≥n de elementos de un visualizador. Gesti√≥n de aplicaciones complejas desarrolladas en Java.",
      dates: ["2026-04-15", "2026-04-16"] },

    { id: 8, title: "BIM sem√°ntico", icon: "bi-building",
      summary: "Introducci√≥n al modelado BIM y gesti√≥n de informaci√≥n asociada.",
      dates: ["2026-04-22", "2026-04-30"] },

    { id: 9, title: "Introducci√≥n a Grasshopper", icon: "bi-diagram-3",
      summary: "Programaci√≥n visual y generaci√≥n param√©trica de geometr√≠a.",
      dates: ["2026-05-06", "2026-05-07"] }
  ];

  const weekdayShortES = ["D", "L", "M", "X", "J", "V", "S"];
  const weekday = d => weekdayShortES[d.getDay()];

  const fmt = d =>
    d.toLocaleDateString("es-ES", { day: "2-digit", month: "2-digit", year: "numeric" });

  function getISOWeek(date) {
    const d = new Date(Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()));
    const dayNum = d.getUTCDay() || 7;
    d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate() + 4 - dayNum);
    const yearStart = new Date(Date.UTC(d.getUTCFullYear(), 0, 1));
    return Math.ceil((((d - yearStart) / 86400000) + 1) / 7);
  }

  const grid = document.getElementById("calendar-grid");

  const today = new Date();
  today.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);

  let foundCurrent = false;
  let prevStart = null;

  /* Render */
  practicas.forEach(p => {

    const dStart = new Date(p.dates[0]);
    const dEnd   = new Date(p.dates[1]);

    const start = new Date(dStart); start.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
    const end   = new Date(dEnd);   end.setHours(23, 59, 59, 999);

    const isPast     = today > end;
    const isOngoing  = today >= start && today <= end;
    const isUpcoming = today < start;

    const isCurrent = !foundCurrent && (isOngoing || isUpcoming);
    if (isCurrent) foundCurrent = true;

    /* Calendar warnings */
    let warnings = [];

    if (prevStart) {
      const diffDays = (start - prevStart) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24);
      if (diffDays < 6) {
        warnings.push("No hay una semana completa desde la pr√°ctica anterior");
      }
      else if (diffDays > 10) {
        warnings.push("Hay una semana completa sin pr√°cticas desde la pr√°ctica anterior");
      }
    }

    if (getISOWeek(start) !== getISOWeek(end)) {
      warnings.push("Las sesiones caen en semanas distintas");
    }

    prevStart = start;

    /* Render card */
    grid.insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend", `
      <div class="practice-card-wrapper">
        <a href="practices/practice${p.id}.html"
           class="text-decoration-none text-reset">

          <div class="card h-100 p-3 shadow-sm border-0 rounded-3 d-flex flex-column
                      ${isCurrent ? "is-current" : ""}
                      ${isPast ? "is-past" : ""}">

            <div class="mb-1">
              <span class="badge bg-primary rounded-pill">Pr√°ctica ${p.id}</span>
              ${isCurrent ? '<span class="badge bg-danger ms-2">ACTUAL</span>' : ''}
            </div>

            <h4 class="card-title mt-2 ${isPast ? "text-muted" : "text-primary"}">
              <i class="bi ${p.icon}"></i> ${p.title}
            </h4>

            <p class="card-text ${isPast ? "text-muted" : "text-secondary"}">
              ${p.summary}
            </p>

            <div class="mt-auto text-muted d-flex flex-column gap-1">
              <div class="d-flex align-items-center gap-2">
                <i class="bi bi-calendar-event"></i>
                <span>
                  ${fmt(dStart)} (${weekday(dStart)}) ‚Äì
                  ${fmt(dEnd)} (${weekday(dEnd)})
                </span>
              </div>

              ${warnings.length ? `
                <div class="text-warning small">
                  ‚ö†Ô∏è ${warnings.join(". ")}
                </div>
              ` : ""}
            </div>

          </div>
        </a>
      </div>
    `);
  });
});
</script>
